verbose_text: XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR The effect is by a nonaccommodative mechanism, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR because a number of studies have shown that atropine inhibits AL : in animals that have no accommodative mechanism 195; when the optic nerve has been cut thus eliminating feedback necessary for accommodation 74; or when regionally induced AL changes occur from blur.
